sentence.Network_en: The hallowed portals of academe were slowly and grudgingly opening to women.
sentence.Network_cn: 大学神圣的大门缓慢又勉强地向女性敞开。

sentence.Network_en: The film studio grudgingly agreed to allow him to continue working.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家电影公司勉强同意让他继续工作。

sentence.Network_en: He grudgingly acknowledged having made a mistake.

entry.def: A grudging feeling or action is felt or done very unwillingly.

example.ex: He even earned his opponents' grudging respect...
example.tran: 他甚至令对手也不得不尊重他。

example.ex: There seems to be a grudging acceptance of the situation.
example.tran: 这一局面看来已经被勉强接受。

sentences.sentence: "he grudgingly agreed to have a drink in a hotel close by"

auth_sentence.content: Yet, the transition was also made grudgingly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet, the transition was also made grudgingly.
